data.caption: Listing of Equity Shares of Brigade Hotel Ventures Ltd
data.news_body: Trading Members of the Exchange are hereby informed that effective from July 31 2025 the equity shares of Brigade Hotel Ventures Ltd (Scrip Code: 544457) are listed and admitted to dealings on the Exchange in the list of B Group Securities. For further details please refer to the notice no. 20250730 dated July 30 2025.
